examples: How do I reset my password?
I need help with my password
responses: You can reset your password by clicking on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.
To reset your password, please follow the instructions sent to your email.
Click the 'Forgot Password' link and follow the steps to create a new password.
For help with your password, visit the password reset page and enter your email address.
If your password isnâ€™t working, try resetting it through the 'Forgot Password' link.
